data.message: Implemented Option C semantic-first proactive recall architecture: Modified proactive.py to always search semantically regardless of hot path classification. Keywords now boost scores (+0.05 per tag overlap) instead of gating access. Changed search_mode to 'semantic_first', lowered min_confidence to 0.2. This fix applies to ALL skill domains - current and future - without requiring keyword additions for each new domain.
data.task: Implemented Option C semantic-first proactive recall architecture
data.outcome: Modified proactive.py to always search semantically regardless of hot path classification. Keywords now boost scores (+0.05 per tag overlap) instead of gating access. Changed search_mode to 'semantic_first', lowered min_confidence to 0.2. This fix applies to ALL skill domains - current and future - without requiring keyword additions for each new domain.
